user_query: I am planning a trip to London and I want to explore popular attractions. Can you provide me with a detailed itinerary that includes attractions, restaurants, and transportation options? It would be great if you could also fetch videos related to those attractions and provide me with the video description, author, and statistics such as the number of comments, hearts, plays, and reposts.

TaskList.description: Research popular attractions in London and compile a list.
Find recommended restaurants near the researched attractions.
Identify transportation options for traveling between the attractions and restaurants.
Fetch videos related to the attractions identified in Subtask 1.
Extract video descriptions, authors, and statistics (comments, hearts, plays, reposts) from the fetched videos.
